name: firefox-launch
description: Extenision that enables the user to launch Firefox from the other browser

scripts.test: npm run build && c8 mocha test/**/*.test.js
scripts.zip:firefox: web-ext build --source-dir build/firefox --artifacts-dir dist --overwrite-dest --filename=firefox.zip --ignore-files=interfaces shared/backgroundScripts shared/pages/welcomePage/script.js shared/pages/welcomePage/browserList.js shared/pages/welcomePage/localization.js browser-polyfill.js
scripts.zip:chromium: web-ext build --source-dir build/chromium --artifacts-dir dist --overwrite-dest --filename=chromium.zip --ignore-files=interfaces shared/backgroundScripts shared/pages/welcomePage/script.js shared/pages/welcomePage/browserList.js shared/pages/welcomePage/localization.js browser-polyfill.js
scripts.build: npm run build:glean && node build.js && webpack --config webpack.config.mjs && npm run zip:firefox && npm run zip:chromium
scripts.build:glean: glean translate metrics.yaml pings.yaml -f javascript -o src/shared/generated

author: mozilla
